instructions_to_main_agent.general: Implement the landing page in 'Landing.js'. Use the provided dark theme colors. Ensure all text is in Russian as per the problem statement. Use Framer Motion for entrance animations.

sections.hero: Headline: 'Создавайте контент, который продаёт. За минуты.' Subheadline: 'AI-генерация постов, изображений и маркетинговых наборов.' CTAs: Primary 'Начать бесплатно', Secondary 'Посмотреть возможности'. Use the 'hero_abstract' image on the right or as a background blend.
sections.features: Create a Bento Grid layout for 5 features: AI Posts, AI Images, Brand AI, Marketing Sets, Analytics. Use icons from lucide-react.
sections.how_it_works: 3-step visual process: 1. Choose Platform -> 2. Generate -> 3. Publish. Connect them with a visual line.
sections.pricing: 3 cards: Free, Pro (Most Popular), Business. Highlight Pro with a border glow or 'tracing beam' effect.
sections.social_proof: Use the 'social_proof_creator' image alongside stats: 1000+ creators, 40K+ posts.
sections.final_cta: Simple, centered section. 'Готовы создавать контент быстрее?'. CTA: 'Начать бесплатно — без карты'.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use generic centered layouts everywhere. Use asymmetry.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs (p-24, py-32).
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
